name: BRIAR PATCH LAUNCHER
effect: The Blast created by this weapon lasts 2 Rounds, then dissipates. Enemy Actors entering the blast or starting their turn inside the blast must make an Engineering save or take Burn 3. Additionally, enemy actors who are within Line of Sight of the Blast must pass a Systems check or come under the delusion that the Blast is also dangerous to friendly actors, this effect lasts until the blast fades.
description: One day, Br’er Spider remembered a story about how his three enemies Mboro, Onini, and Obeso caught him in a clever trap involving some delicious yams. While arguing what to do with him, Br’er Spider begged them, do not throw him into the briar patch! So that’s where they threw him. Idiots. We worked hard to make something good enough, just for you. A gun that shoots mines all chained together and ready to go. It’ll make a Briar Patch for you to hide in.
